structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. FIFTH AND SIXTH CENT LOCAL OPTION GAS TAX

text.section:
Sec. 29-73. Disposition of revenue.
As set forth in an interlocal agreement entered into by the County and those cities representing a majority of the population of the incorporated area of Miami-Dade County, the County agrees to distribute the net proceeds of the fifth and sixth cent local option gas tax, seventy-four (74) percent to the County and twenty-six (26) percent to be distributed by formula among the eligible incorporated municipalities in Miami-Dade County.
